short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One searchbar for all your company knows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Realm extension allows you to search Realm directly through your Chrome address bar, or by pressing CMD/CTRL + Shift + K. This extension is only usable if you have a user account with Realm.
